fatemon.name: jelly beast
fatemon.desc: A vast and legendary beast that roams the seven seas. Terrorising unsuspecting sailors and engineers alike.

moves.name: jelly belly
moves.description: Jelly beast smashes a jar of jelly on belly and lubricates it itself. It can slip around faster now!

moves.name: Reschedule meeting
moves.description: Jelly beast reschedules your meetings, infuriating you and your Fatemon

moves.name: Body Slam
moves.description: You are crushed under a mountain of flesh

moves.name: belly juice
moves.description: a vile squirt of belly juice blinds your Fatemon
